parts.name: Picture description
parts.title: For each question, you will see a picture and you will hear four short statements. The statements will be spoken just one time. They will not be printed in your test book so you must listen carefully to understand what the speaker says. When you hear the four statements, look at the picture and choose the statement that best describes what you see in the picture. Choose the best answer A, B, C or D

intro.title:
EXAMPLE:
Now listen to the four statements.
Statement (D) best describes what you see in the picture.
Therefore, you should choose answer (D).
intro.answers: ["A. He is on the phone","B. She is driving the car","C. She is typing on the computer","D. He is sitting next to her"]

parts.name: Question - response
parts.title: In this part of the test, you will hear a question or statement spoken in English, followed by three responses, also spoken in English. The question or statement and the responses will be spoken just one time. They will not be printed in your test book, so you must listen carefully. You are to choose the best response to each question or statement.

intro.title:
You will hear:
Why are you late?
intro.answers: ["A. I hope I won't be","B. My car broke down","C. He alway is"]
intro.explains: The best response is choice B. "My car broke down". Therefore, you should choose B.

parts.name: Short conversations
parts.title: You will hear some conversations between two people. You will be asked to answer three questions about what the speakers say in each conversation. Select the best response to each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet. The conversations will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time.

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: Ms. Chin, Ms. Frankel, I'm sorry that the gallery hasn't been looking very tidy lately. I've been so busy with all the artwork that we've been receiving that I haven't had time to focus on cleaning.

W-Br: Oh, I know. The gallery's been so busy that it's hard to keep up with sweeping and dusting the main display area. 

W-Am: Why don't we hire a cleaning service?

M-Cn: Sure. I can call a few local cleaning services to get some prices.

W-Am: That'd be great. Thanks for bringing this up.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Cô Chin, cô Frankel, tôi xin l\u1ed7i vì phòng tranh g\u1ea7n \u0111ây nhìn không g\u1ecdn gàng l\u1eafm. Tôi \u0111ã r\u1ea5t b\u1eadn r\u1ed9n v\u1edbi t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các tác ph\u1ea9m ngh\u1ec7 thu\u1eadt mà chúng ta nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nên tôi không có th\u1eddi gian \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1eadp trung vào vi\u1ec7c d\u1ecdn d\u1eb9p.<\/p>

W-Br: \u1ed2, tôi bi\u1ebft. Phòng tr\u01b0ng bày quá b\u1eadn r\u1ed9n \u0111\u1ebfn n\u1ed7i khó có th\u1ec3 theo k\u1ecbp v\u1edbi vi\u1ec7c quét d\u1ecdn và lau b\u1ee5i khu tr\u01b0ng bày chính.<\/p>

W-Am: T\u1ea1i sao chúng ta không thuê d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 d\u1ecdn d\u1eb9p nh\u1ec9?<\/p>

M-Cn: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c thôi. Tôi có th\u1ec3 g\u1ecdi vài d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 d\u1ecdn d\u1eb9p \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng \u0111\u1ec3 h\u1ecfi giá.<\/p>

W-Am: \u0110i\u1ec1u \u0111ó nghe tuy\u1ec7t \u0111\u1ea5y. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã nh\u1eafc \u0111\u1ebfn vi\u1ec7c này.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Excuse me. I don't live in the city, but I'm here for a conference. Can you tell me which bus goes to the conference center at forty-first and Stockton Street?

M-Au: That's the number eight bus. The conference center is just two stops down.

W-Am: Oh good, thanks. I'm a little concerned about arriving late for the opening ceremony.

M-Au: Oh, it shouldn't take long at all to get there. And if you're going to be here for a few days, I suggest buying a weekly pass. It's good for unlimited travel around the city.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Xin l\u1ed7i. Tôi không s\u1ed1ng \u1edf thành ph\u1ed1, nh\u01b0ng tôi \u1edf \u0111ây vì m\u1ed9t h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb. Anh có th\u1ec3 cho tôi bi\u1ebft chuy\u1ebfn xe buýt nào \u0111i \u0111\u1ebfn trung tâm h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb \u1edf s\u1ed1 41 và \u0110\u01b0\u1eddng Stockton không?<\/p>

M-Au: \u0110ó là xe buýt s\u1ed1 8. Trung tâm h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n \u0111i qua hai tr\u1ea1m thôi.<\/p>

W-Am: \u1ed2 t\u1ed1t, c\u1ea3m \u01a1n. Tôi có h\u01a1i lo l\u1eafng v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u1ebfn bu\u1ed5i l\u1ec5 khai m\u1ea1c mu\u1ed9n.<\/p>

M-Au: \u1ed2, nó s\u1ebd không m\u1ea5t lâu \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111ó \u0111âu. Và n\u1ebfu cô \u1edf \u0111ây vài ngày, tôi \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb nên mua vé theo tu\u1ea7n. Nó s\u1ebd phù h\u1ee3p cho vi\u1ec7c di chuy\u1ec3n không gi\u1edbi h\u1ea1n quanh thành ph\u1ed1.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Au: Excuse me, I'm ready to check out of the hotel.

W-Br: I can help you with that. How was your stay?

M-Au: The room was very nice, but the parking garage is so small. There were never any available parking spots, so I ended up having to pay to park on the street.

W-Br: I'm sorry about that. The good news is, we're scheduled to begin construction next week to expand the parking garage. Next time you won't have that problem.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Xin l\u1ed7i, tôi s\u1eb5n sàng \u0111\u1ec3 thanh toán hóa \u0111\u01a1n khách s\u1ea1n.<\/p>

W-Br: Tôi có th\u1ec3 giúp anh v\u1edbi vi\u1ec7c \u0111ó. Anh th\u1ea5y kho\u1ea3ng th\u1eddi gian \u1edf l\u1ea1i \u0111ây nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào?<\/p>

M-Au: C\u0103n phòng r\u1ea5t là \u0111\u1eb9p, nh\u01b0ng nhà \u0111\u1ed7 xe l\u1ea1i quá nh\u1ecf. Ch\u01b0a bao gi\u1edd có ch\u1ed7 \u0111\u1ed7 xe có s\u1eb5n nào, nên tôi ph\u1ea3i tr\u1ea3 ti\u1ec1n \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ed7 xe \u1edf bên \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng.<\/p>

W-Br: Tôi xin l\u1ed7i v\u1ec1 \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó. Tin t\u1ed1t là, chúng tôi s\u1ebd b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u thi công vào tu\u1ea7n t\u1edbi \u0111\u1ec3 m\u1edf r\u1ed9ng bãi \u0111\u1ed7 xe. L\u1ea7n sau anh s\u1ebd không g\u1eb7p v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 \u0111ó n\u1eefa.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: Hi, welcome to Gold Pyramid Clothing.

W-Br: Hi, I bought a shirt here for my son, but unfortunately, he doesn't like the color. What's your return policy?

M-Cn: As long as it hasn't been more than 30 days since you purchased the item, and you have a receipt, you can receive a full refund.

W-Br: Hmm, actually, I seem to have lost my receipt.

M-Cn: Well, then I can't give you a refund. But, you can exchange it for a different color.

W-Br: OK, I'll do that then.

M-Cn: Sure! I think we have that shirt in stock in black and green.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Xin chào, chào m\u1eebng \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi Gold Pyramid Clothing.<\/p>

W-Br: Chào, tôi \u0111ã mua m\u1ed9t cái áo \u1edf \u0111ây cho con trai tôi, nh\u01b0ng th\u1eadt không may là con trai tôi nó không thích màu này. Chính sách hoàn tr\u1ea3 c\u1ee7a các anh là gì?<\/p>

M-Cn: Mi\u1ec5n là ch\u01b0a quá 30 ngày k\u1ec3 t\u1eeb khi cô mua m\u1eb7t hàng và có biên lai, cô có th\u1ec3 nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ti\u1ec1n hoàn tr\u1ea3 \u0111\u1ea7y \u0111\u1ee7.<\/p>

W-Br: \u1eeam, th\u1ef1c ra thì có v\u1ebb nh\u01b0 tôi \u0111ã làm m\u1ea5t hóa \u0111\u01a1n r\u1ed3i.<\/p>

M-Cn: V\u1eady thì tôi không th\u1ec3 hoàn l\u1ea1i ti\u1ec1n cho cô \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c. Nh\u01b0ng, cô có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ed5i nó l\u1ea5y m\u1ed9t màu khác.<\/p>

W-Br: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c, tôi s\u1ebd làm v\u1eady.<\/p>

M-Cn: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c thôi! Tôi ngh\u0129 chúng tôi còn áo \u0111ó v\u1edbi màu \u0111en và màu xanh lá.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: I just heard about the company's plan to open a second housewares store. They want to put it in the Centerville Mall, but I don't think we'd get enough business selling household items there

M-Au: Well, the marketing team has done the research.

W-Br: I thought people mostly shopped for electronics at that mall, not decorative items for the home

M-Au: That's a good point. But we'll just have to wait and see what the board of directors decides at their meeting in January.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Tôi v\u1eeba m\u1edbi nghe v\u1ec1 k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch c\u1ee7a công ty trong vi\u1ec7c khai tr\u01b0\u01a1ng c\u1eeda hàng \u0111\u1ed3 dùng gia \u0111ình th\u1ee9 hai. H\u1ecd mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u1eb7t nó t\u1ea1i Trung Tâm Mua S\u1eafm Centerville, nh\u01b0ng tôi không ngh\u0129 là chúng ta s\u1ebd bán \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c m\u1eb7t hàng gia \u0111ình \u1edf \u0111ó.<\/p>

M-Au: À thì, t\u1ed5 ti\u1ebfp th\u1ecb \u0111ã th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n vài nghiên c\u1ee9u.<\/p>

W-Br: Tôi t\u01b0\u1edfng m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi h\u1ea7u nh\u01b0 ch\u1ec9 mua s\u1eafm \u0111\u1ed3 \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed \u1edf khu mua s\u1eafm \u0111ó, ch\u1ee9 không ph\u1ea3i v\u1eadt d\u1ee5ng trang trí nhà c\u1eeda<\/p>

M-Au: \u0110ó là m\u1ed9t \u0111i\u1ec3m lý thú. Nh\u01b0ng chúng ta s\u1ebd ph\u1ea3i ch\u1edd xem h\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ed3ng qu\u1ea3n tr\u1ecb quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf nào t\u1ea1i cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd vào tháng 1.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Hello Jun-Young, this is Sandra. I wanted to let you know that although I have the raw numbers needed to generate the quarterly sales reports, I'm having a problem with the software program.

M-Cn: What's the problem? We'd like to receive those reports here in Accounting by this afternoon.

W-Br: Well, we use a secure software program to create the reports, and... my password isn't working. I'm completely locked out of the system. This problem may delay getting you the reports.

M-Cn: Thanks for letting me know. I'm going to call my administrative assistant. He used to work in technical support. I think he'll be able to help you.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Xin chào Jun-Young, \u0111ây là Sandra. Tôi mu\u1ed1n cho anh bi\u1ebft r\u1eb1ng m\u1eb7c dù tôi có nh\u1eefng s\u1ed1 li\u1ec7u thô c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ec3 làm báo cáo doanh s\u1ed1 hàng quý, tôi \u0111ang g\u1eb7p v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 v\u1edbi ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m.<\/p>

M-Cn: V\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 gì? B\u1ecdn tôi t\u1ea1i Phòng K\u1ebf Toán mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nh\u1eadn nh\u1eefng báo cáo này vào chi\u1ec1u nay.<\/p>

W-Br: À thì, chúng tôi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng m\u1ed9t ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m an toàn \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ea1o ra các báo cáo và... m\u1eadt kh\u1ea9u c\u1ee7a tôi không ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng. Tôi hoàn toàn b\u1ecb khóa kh\u1ecfi h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng. V\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 này có th\u1ec3 s\u1ebd c\u1ea3n tr\u1edf anh l\u1ea5y \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nh\u1eefng báo cáo.<\/p>

M-Bn: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã cho tôi bi\u1ebft. Tôi s\u1ebd g\u1ecdi cho tr\u1ee3 lý hành chính. Anh ta \u0111ã t\u1eebng làm vi\u1ec7c trong b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn h\u1ed7 tr\u1ee3 k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt. Tôi ngh\u0129 anh ta có th\u1ec3 giúp cô.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Hi, I'm Mary Smith. I had an appointment with Dr. Watanabe at two P.M., but I missed it because my bus was delayed. Can she still see me?

M-Au: I'll check, but she's been busy this week. Her partner, Dr. Garcia, is away on a business trip. So she's been seeing all of Dr. Garcia's patients as well as her own. Oh, here she is. Dr. Watanabe?

W-Am: Yes, John?

M-Au: Mary missed her earlier appointment. Is there any chance you could see her now?

W-Am: Yes, just give me a few minutes to review her file.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Chào, tôi Là Mary Smith. Tôi có h\u1eb9n v\u1edbi Bác s\u0129 Watanabe lúc 2 gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u nh\u01b0ng tôi \u0111ã l\u1ee1 nó vì chuy\u1ebfn xe buýt c\u1ee7a tôi b\u1ecb tr\u1ec5. Cô \u1ea5y còn có th\u1ec3 g\u1eb7p tôi không?<\/p>

M-Au: Tôi s\u1ebd ki\u1ec3m tra, nh\u01b0ng cô \u1ea5y b\u1eadn vào tu\u1ea7n này. C\u1ed9ng s\u1ef1 c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y, Bác s\u0129 Garcia, \u0111ang \u0111i công tác. Vì v\u1eady cô \u1ea5y \u0111ã g\u1eb7p t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 b\u1ec7nh nhân c\u1ee7a Bác s\u0129 Garcia c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y. \u1ed2, cô \u1ea5y \u0111ây r\u1ed3i. Bác s\u0129 Watanabe à?<\/p>

W-Am: Có gì không John?<\/p>

M-Au: Mary \u0111ã l\u1ee1 cu\u1ed9c h\u1eb9n tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó. Có c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i nào \u0111\u1ec3 cô g\u1eb7p cô \u1ea5y không?<\/p>

W-Am: Có, hãy cho tôi vài phút \u0111\u1ec3 xem h\u1ed3 s\u01a1 c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Au: Kondo Landscaping, how can I help you?

W-Br: Hi. I'm calling because my company wants to have a patio area built behind our office. Could you build a space where about 25 employees could sit outside during their lunch break?

M-Au: Yes, we build patios. We usually start outdoor projects in the spring. We don't build patios in the winter because the cold weather can damage the materials we use.

W-Br: OK, let me go over this with my manager. Thanks.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Kondo Landscaping, tôi có th\u1ec3 giúp gì cho b\u1ea1n?<\/p>

W-Br: Xin chào. Tôi g\u1ecdi vì công ty c\u1ee7a tôi mu\u1ed1n có m\u1ed9t khu v\u1ef1c sân trong \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xây \u1edf phía sau v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Anh có th\u1ec3 xây m\u1ed9t không gian cho kho\u1ea3ng 25 nhân viên ng\u1ed3i bên ngoài trong gi\u1edd ngh\u1ec9 tr\u01b0a không?<\/p>

M-Au: Vâng, chúng tôi có xây sân trong. Chúng tôi th\u01b0\u1eddng b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u d\u1ef1 án ngoài tr\u1eddi vào mùa xuân. Chúng tôi không xây sân trong vào mùa \u0111ông vì th\u1eddi ti\u1ebft l\u1ea1nh giá có th\u1ec3 làm t\u1ed5n h\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u chúng tôi s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng.<\/p>

W-Br: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, hãy \u0111\u1ec3 tôi bàn qua v\u1edbi qu\u1ea3n lý c\u1ee7a mình. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Lian, since we're going to start making our own line of organic shampoo, I wanted to discuss something with you.

W-Am: Sure. What is it?

W-Br: It's about this company called B Thompson International. They help small companies like ours do market research. They'll give our shampoo to some people and then ask their opinions about the product.

W-Am: Hmm... With such early feedback on our shampoo, we'd know more about what potential customers really want.

W-Br: Exactly. And this could save us time and money at later development stages.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Lian, vì chúng ta s\u1ebd b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u t\u1ea1o ra dòng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m d\u1ea7u g\u1ed9i \u0111\u1ea7u c\u1ee7a riêng mình, tôi mu\u1ed1n th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn m\u1ed9t chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi cô.<\/p>

W-Am: Ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ed3i. Chuy\u1ec7n gì v\u1eady?<\/p>

W-Br: \u0110ó là v\u1ec1 công ty này có tên là B Thompson International. H\u1ecd giúp nh\u1eefng công ty nh\u1ecf nh\u01b0 chúng ta làm nghiên c\u1ee9u th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng. H\u1ecd s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0a d\u1ea7u g\u1ed9i c\u1ee7a chúng ta cho m\u1ed9t vài ng\u01b0\u1eddi và sau \u0111ó h\u1ecfi ý ki\u1ebfn c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd v\u1ec1 s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m.<\/p>

W-Am: \u1eeam.... V\u1edbi nh\u1eefng ph\u1ea3n h\u1ed3i s\u1edbm nh\u01b0 v\u1eady v\u1ec1 d\u1ea7u g\u1ed9i c\u1ee7a chúng ta, chúng ta s\u1ebd bi\u1ebft thêm v\u1ec1 nh\u1eefng gì khách hàng ti\u1ec1m n\u0103ng th\u1ef1c s\u1ef1 mu\u1ed1n.<\/p>

W-Br: Chính xác là nh\u01b0 v\u1eady. Và \u0111i\u1ec1u này có th\u1ec3 ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m th\u1eddi gian và ti\u1ec1n b\u1ea1c cho các giai \u0111o\u1ea1n phát tri\u1ec3n v\u1ec1 sau.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Au: Hi, Jasmine. Our new client from Brazil will be here next week. Could you give a tour of our facilities Monday morning?

W-Br: Oh, I'm attending the all-day software training on Monday.

M-Au: Um, OK... Maybe Hiroto's free?

W-Br: I think so. Want me to ask him?

M-Au: Yes, and if he is, tell him to call me for the details.

W-Br: OK. By the way - I have noticed that we've signed contracts with several new international clients over the last six months. That's great!

M-Au: Yes, and if we continue to attract clients like this, we may be able to accomplish our goal of opening a second office by early next year.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Chào, Jasmine. Khách hàng m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a chúng ta \u1edf Brazil s\u1ebd \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111ây vào tu\u1ea7n sau. Cô có th\u1ec3 h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn tham quan các c\u01a1 s\u1edf c\u1ee7a chúng ta vào sáng th\u1ee9 hai không?<\/p>

W-Br: \u1ed2, tôi s\u1ebd tham d\u1ef1 ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình \u0111ào t\u1ea1o ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m c\u1ea3 ngày vào hôm th\u1ee9 hai.<\/p>

M-Au: \u1eeam, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i... Có l\u1ebd là Hiroto s\u1ebd r\u1ea3nh nh\u1ec9?<\/p>

W-Br: Tôi ngh\u0129 v\u1eady. Có mu\u1ed1n tôi h\u1ecfi anh ta không?<\/p>

M-Au: Có, và n\u1ebfu anh \u1ea5y r\u1ea3nh, hãy nói anh \u1ea5y g\u1ecdi cho tôi.<\/p>

W-Br: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i. Nhân ti\u1ec7n thì - tôi có \u0111\u1ec3 ý r\u1eb1ng chúng ta \u0111ã ký h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng v\u1edbi vài khách hàng qu\u1ed1c t\u1ebf m\u1edbi trong sáu tháng qua. \u0110i\u1ec1u \u0111ó th\u1eadt tuy\u1ec7t!<\/p>

M-Au: \u0110úng, và n\u1ebfu chúng ta ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c thu hút khách hàng gi\u1ed1ng nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf, chúng ta có th\u1ec3 hoàn thành m\u1ee5c tiêu khai tr\u01b0\u01a1ng v\u0103n phòng th\u1ee9 hai vào \u0111\u1ea7u n\u0103m t\u1edbi.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Welcome to the Department of Motor Vehicles. How can I help you?

M-Cn: Hi, I want to sign up to take a driver's license test.

W-Am: To register is 30 dollars.

M-Cn: Wow, that much? I thought it'd be less expensive... Uh... when can I take it?

W-Am: We give the driver's license tests every week, but they're all booked until... July twelfth.

M-Cn: Oh, I'll be on vacation in July.

W-Am: We have an opening on August third.

M-Cn: Good. I'll register for that.

W-Am: OK, I'll just take your information for your driver's license, but you'll need to go pay at the next window.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Chào m\u1eebng \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi C\u1ee5c Xe C\u01a1 Gi\u1edbi. Tôi có th\u1ec3 giúp gì cho anh?<\/p>

M-Cn: Xin chào, tôi mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u0103ng ký làm ki\u1ec3m tra l\u1ea5y b\u1eb1ng lái.<\/p>

W-Am: Phí \u0111\u0103ng ký là 30 \u0111ô la.<\/p>

M-Cn: Chà, nhi\u1ec1u \u0111\u1ebfn th\u1ebf \u01b0? Tôi t\u01b0\u1edfng là nó s\u1ebd b\u1edbt \u0111\u1eaft h\u01a1n ch\u1ee9...\u1eeamm... khi nào tôi có th\u1ec3 làm ki\u1ec3m tra?<\/p>

W-Am: Chúng tôi s\u1ebd cho làm ki\u1ec3m tra l\u1ea5y b\u1eb1ng lái m\u1ed7i tu\u1ea7n, nh\u01b0ng t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 \u0111\u1ec1u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1eb7t ch\u1ed7 h\u1ebft cho \u0111\u1ebfn....12 tháng 7.<\/p>

M-Cn: \u1ed2, tôi s\u1ebd \u0111i ngh\u1ec9 mát vào tháng 7.<\/p>

W-Am: Chúng tôi có ch\u1ed7 tr\u1ed1ng vào ngày 3 tháng 8.<\/p>

M-Cn: T\u1ed1t. V\u1eady tôi s\u1ebd \u0111\u0103ng ký ngày \u0111ó.<\/p>

W-Am: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, tôi s\u1ebd l\u1ea5y thông tin cho b\u1eb1ng lái c\u1ee7a anh, nh\u01b0ng anh c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i tr\u1ea3 phí \u1edf c\u1eeda s\u1ed5 ti\u1ebfp theo.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Bangalore Designs, can I help you?

M-Au: Hi, I'm from Hanson's Lumber Store. I'm calling because I'm trying to deliver a load of wood at your business.

W-Am: Right - we need that order to build some special tables and chairs.

M-Au: Well, I tried to go to the loading dock on Elm Drive, but that road's closed for repairs. Can I leave the wood near the entrance by the parking area?

W-Am: That door leads to our furniture showroom. Could you come to the Spruce Avenue entrance instead?

M-Au: Spruce Avenue? Sure.

W-Am: In case you have trouble finding it, I'll come out to the street to guide you. You can recognize me by my yellow coat.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Bangalore Designs, tôi có th\u1ec3 giúp gì cho b\u1ea1n?<\/p>

M-Au: Chào, tôi \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1eeb C\u1eeda Hàng G\u1ed7 Hanson. Tôi g\u1ecdi vì tôi \u0111ang c\u1ed1 g\u1eafng giao m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ed1ng g\u1ed7 cho doanh nghi\u1ec7p c\u1ee7a cô.<\/p>

W-Am: Ph\u1ea3i - chúng tôi c\u1ea7n \u0111\u01a1n hàng \u0111ó \u0111\u1ec3 l\u1eafp ráp m\u1ed9t vài cái bàn và gh\u1ebf \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t.<\/p>

M-Au: Vâng, tôi \u0111ã c\u1ed1 g\u1eafng \u0111\u1ebfn kho c\u1ea3ng \u1edf Elm Drive, nh\u01b0ng con \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111ó \u0111ã b\u1ecb ch\u1eb7n l\u1ea1i \u0111\u1ec3 s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa. Tôi có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ec3 g\u1ed7 \u1edf g\u1ea7n l\u1ed1i vào khu v\u1ef1c \u0111\u1ed7 xe không?<\/p>

W-Am: Cánh c\u1eeda \u0111ó d\u1eabn vào phòng tr\u01b0ng bày n\u1ed9i th\u1ea5t c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Thay vào \u0111ó, anh có th\u1ec3 \u0111i \u0111\u1ebfn l\u1ed1i vào \u0110\u1ea1i l\u1ed9 Spruce \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c không?<\/p>

M-Au: \u0110\u1ea1i l\u1ed9 Spruce? Ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ed3i.<\/p>

W-Am: Trong tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ee3p anh g\u1eb7p r\u1eafc r\u1ed1i trong lúc tìm nó, tôi s\u1ebd ra \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng \u0111\u1ec3 h\u01b0\u1edbng d\u1eabn anh. Anh có th\u1ec3 nh\u1eadn ra chi\u1ebfc áo khoác màu vàng c\u1ee7a tôi.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Cn: Hi, Caroline. Did you see the chart that was posted in the break room? I really like the nutritional program that Human Resources is promoting.

W-Br: Me too. I think eating certain foods is important not just for our health; it also makes us more productive.

M-Cn: I agree. For example, I've been told that I need more vitamin A, and the chart shows me one fruit that is rich in vitamin A.

W-Br: Of course, it would also help if the cafeteria offered healthier options...

M-Cn: Isn't there a suggestion box at the cafeteria? Maybe we could submit some ideas.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Chào, Caroline. Cô có xem bi\u1ec3u \u0111\u1ed3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u0103ng trong phòng ngh\u1ec9 ch\u01b0a? Tôi th\u1ef1c s\u1ef1 r\u1ea5t thích ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình dinh d\u01b0\u1ee1ng mà Phòng Nhân S\u1ef1 \u0111ang thúc \u0111\u1ea9y.<\/p>

W-Br: Tôi c\u0169ng v\u1eady. Tôi ngh\u0129 là \u0103n m\u1ed9t vài lo\u1ea1i th\u1ef1c ph\u1ea9m nh\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ecbnh là \u0111i\u1ec1u quan tr\u1ecdng không ch\u1ec9 cho s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe c\u1ee7a chúng ta mà còn giúp chúng ta làm vi\u1ec7c hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3 h\u01a1n.<\/p>

M-Cn: Tôi \u0111\u1ed3ng ý. Ví d\u1ee5, tôi \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nghe r\u1eb1ng mình c\u1ea7n thêm vitamin A, và bi\u1ec3u \u0111\u1ed3 cho tôi th\u1ea5y m\u1ed9t lo\u1ea1i trái cây giàu vitamin A.<\/p>

W-Br: T\u1ea5t nhiên r\u1ed3i, nó c\u0169ng s\u1ebd r\u1ea5t là giúp ích n\u1ebfu c\u0103ng tin có nh\u1eefng l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn \u0103n u\u1ed1ng lành m\u1ea1nh h\u01a1n.<\/p>

M-Cn: Ch\u1eb3ng ph\u1ea3i là có m\u1ed9t cái h\u1ed9p góp ý \u1edf c\u0103ng tin sao? Có l\u1ebd chúng ta có th\u1ec3 n\u1ed9p m\u1ed9t vài ý t\u01b0\u1edfng.<\/p>"}

parts.name: Short talks
parts.title: You will hear some talks given by a single speaker. You will be asked to answer three questions about what the speaker says in each talk. Select the best response to each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet. The talks will not be printed in your test book and will be spoken only one time.

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: Now, I'd like to discuss the next issue of our travel magazine, which will focus on traveling on a budget. One of the articles will be about free mobile applications that make vacationing easier and cheaper.
 Tomorrow morning I'll be assigning each of you at least two apps, and I expect you to spend the morning writing a short report on them.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Bây gi\u1edd thì tôi mu\u1ed1n th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 s\u1ed1 ti\u1ebfp theo c\u1ee7a t\u1ea1p chí du l\u1ecbch, nó s\u1ebd t\u1eadp trung vào vi\u1ec7c \u0111i du l\u1ecbch ti\u1ebft ki\u1ec7m. M\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng bài báo s\u1ebd là v\u1ec1 các \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng di \u0111\u1ed9ng mi\u1ec5n phí giúp cho vi\u1ec7c ngh\u1ec9 mát d\u1ec5 dàng h\u01a1n và r\u1ebb ti\u1ec1n h\u01a1n. Vì v\u1eady, công vi\u1ec7c nghiên c\u1ee9u \u0111\u1ea7u tiên c\u1ee7a các b\u1ea1n là tìm hi\u1ec3u v\u1ec1 các \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng cung c\u1ea5p thông tin du l\u1ecbch mi\u1ec5n phí và m\u1edbi nh\u1ea5t - nh\u1eefng \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng nh\u01b0 tìm ch\u1ed7 \u1edf \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ho\u1eb7c ph\u01b0\u01a1ng ti\u1ec7n giao thông công c\u1ed9ng. Hãy g\u1eedi cho tôi tên c\u1ee7a \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng mà các b\u1ea1n tìm th\u1ea5y vào cu\u1ed1i ngày. Sáng mai tôi s\u1ebd giao cho m\u1ed7i ng\u01b0\u1eddi ít nh\u1ea5t hai \u1ee9ng d\u1ee5ng, và tôi mong các b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd dành bu\u1ed5i sáng vi\u1ebft m\u1ed9t bài báo cáo ng\u1eafn v\u1ec1 chúng.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: M-Cn: Hi, Katrina! It's Steven, the coach of the Greentown Lions basketball team. Listen, I just took a look at the schedule for basketball court reservations for next month. We're scheduled to use the courts from four to five P.M. The thing is... many of my players work in the afternoon, so they can't get to the courts until quarter to five. You've got the courts reserved from five to six... Could you call me back when you have the chance? Thanks!
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Chào, Katrina! Là Steven \u0111ây, hu\u1ea5n luy\u1ec7n viên c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed9i tuy\u1ec3n bóng r\u1ed5 Greentown Lions. Nghe này, tôi v\u1eeba m\u1edbi xem qua l\u1ecbch \u0111\u1eb7t ch\u1ed7 sân bóng r\u1ed5 tháng sau. Chúng tôi d\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ecbnh s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng sân bóng t\u1eeb 4 \u0111\u1ebfn 5 gi\u1edd chi\u1ec1u. V\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 là... nhi\u1ec1u c\u1ea7u th\u1ee7 c\u1ee7a tôi ph\u1ea3i làm vi\u1ec7c vào bu\u1ed5i chi\u1ec1u, vì v\u1eady h\u1ecd không th\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ebfn sân cho \u0111\u1ebfn 5 gi\u1edd kém 15. Cô \u0111ã \u0111\u1eb7t ch\u1ed7 cho sân bóng t\u1eeb 5 \u0111\u1ebfn 6 gi\u1edd.... Cô có th\u1ec3 g\u1ecdi l\u1ea1i cho tôi khi cô có c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i không? C\u1ea3m \u01a1n!<\/p>"}

The thing is... many of my players work in the afternoon, so they can't get to the courts until quarter to five.<\/p>","en":"

childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao ng\u01b0\u1eddi nói l\u1ea1i nói, \"Cô \u0111ã \u0111\u1eb7t ch\u1ed7 cho sân bóng t\u1eeb 5 \u0111\u1ebfn 6 gi\u1edd\"?<\/p>

D. Chúc m\u1eebng m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ed3ng nghi\u1ec7p<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

We're scheduled to use the courts from four to five P.M. The thing is... many of my players work in the afternoon, so they can't get to the courts until quarter to five. You've got the courts reserved from five to six...<\/p>","en":"

Why does the speaker say, \"You've got the courts reserved from five to six\"?<\/p>

A. To confirm an appointment<\/p>

B. To express surprise<\/p>

C. To request a change<\/p>

D. To congratulate a colleague<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

We're scheduled to use the courts from four to five P.M. The thing is... many of my players work in the afternoon, so they can't get to the courts until quarter to five. You've got the courts reserved from five to six...<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
M-Au: OK, everyone. That was a productive staff meeting. Thanks for all of your suggestions for a team-building event. I'm glad we all decided to organize an office soccer game next month. I'm really looking forward to it. Oh, I just
remembered one more thing. Some of you have been complaining about the noise coming from the construction work on the roof. I'm happy to report that the contractors are finishing the project this afternoon.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi. V\u1eady là k\u1ebft thúc cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp hi\u1ec7u su\u1ea5t nhân viên. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 nh\u1eefng g\u1ee3i ý c\u1ee7a các b\u1ea1n cho s\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n xây d\u1ef1ng \u0111\u1ed9i nhóm. Tôi m\u1eebng vì t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 chúng ta \u0111ã quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c m\u1ed9t tr\u1eadn \u0111\u1ea5u bóng \u0111á v\u0103n phòng vào tháng t\u1edbi. Tôi r\u1ea5t mong ch\u1edd \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó. \u1ed2, tôi v\u1eeba nh\u1edb ra m\u1ed9t chuy\u1ec7n n\u1eefa. M\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 ng\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111ã phàn nàn v\u1ec1 ti\u1ebfng \u1ed3n t\u1eeb công trình xây d\u1ef1ng trên mái nhà. Tôi r\u1ea5t vui khi báo r\u1eb1ng các nhà th\u1ea7u s\u1ebd hoàn thành d\u1ef1 án vào chi\u1ec1u nay.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: W-Am: Good evening. Tonight I'll be talking about a new initiative by GS Incorporated, a leading manufacturer of mobile phones and electronic accessories. As part of its commitment to sustainability, GS Incorporated announced today that it has started to package its products in a more environmentally friendly way. Now, they come in boxes made entirely of recycled materials. After a short commercial break, I'll be interviewing a representative from GS Incorporated about what inspired these changes.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: Chào bu\u1ed5i t\u1ed1i. T\u1ed1i nay tôi s\u1ebd nói v\u1ec1 m\u1ed9t ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng kh\u1edfi x\u01b0\u1edbng m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a Công ty GS, m\u1ed9t nhà s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t \u0111i\u1ec7n tho\u1ea1i di \u0111\u1ed9ng và các ph\u1ee5 ki\u1ec7n \u0111i\u1ec7n t\u1eed hàng \u0111\u1ea7u. Nh\u01b0 là m\u1ed9t ph\u1ea7n cam k\u1ebft c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi s\u1ef1 b\u1ec1n v\u1eefng, Công ty GS ngày hôm nay \u0111ã thông báo r\u1eb1ng h\u1ecd \u0111ã b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u \u0111óng gói s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m c\u1ee7a mình m\u1ed9t cách thân thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi môi tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u01a1n. Bây gi\u1edd, chúng xu\u1ea5t hi\u1ec7n trong nh\u1eefng chi\u1ebfc h\u1ed9p \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c làm hoàn toàn b\u1eb1ng v\u1eadt li\u1ec7u tái ch\u1ebf. Sau m\u1ed9t \u0111o\u1ea1n qu\u1ea3ng cáo ng\u1eafn, tôi s\u1ebd ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ea1i di\u1ec7n t\u1eeb Công ty GS v\u1ec1 c\u1ea3m h\u1ee9ng cho nh\u1eefng thay \u0111\u1ed5i này.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: W-Am: Thanks for tuning in to today's health show. I have a question for my listeners. Have you been wanting to lower your sugar intake but just can't resist that sweet snack at the local cafe? Today, I'll teach you about an eating program that will stop your cravings permanently. I used this program to lower my sugar intake, and it worked! In fact, this program could help you change any eating behavior in one month. That's not a lot of time! The first step is setting goals. So take out a piece of paper and write down three eating habits you'd like to change.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã \u0111ón nghe ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe hôm nay. Tôi có m\u1ed9t câu h\u1ecfi cho các thính gi\u1ea3 c\u1ee7a mình. B\u1ea1n có mu\u1ed1n h\u1ea1 th\u1ea5p l\u01b0\u1ee3ng \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng c\u1ee7a mình nh\u01b0ng không th\u1ec3 nào c\u01b0\u1ee1ng l\u1ea1i cái bánh ng\u1ecdt t\u1ea1i ti\u1ec7m cà phê \u0111\u1ecba ph\u01b0\u01a1ng không? Hôm nay, tôi s\u1ebd d\u1ea1y cho các b\u1ea1n v\u1ec1 m\u1ed9t ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình \u0103n u\u1ed1ng s\u1ebd giúp b\u1ea1n ng\u1eebng thèm \u0103n v\u0129nh vi\u1ec5n. Tôi \u0111ã dùng ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình này \u0111\u1ec3 giúp h\u1ea1 th\u1ea5p l\u01b0\u1ee3ng \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng c\u1ee7a mình, và nó \u0111ã r\u1ea5t hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3! Trên th\u1ef1c t\u1ebf, ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình này có th\u1ec3 giúp b\u1ea1n thay \u0111\u1ed5i b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 thói quen \u0103n u\u1ed1ng nào trong m\u1ed9t tháng. Th\u1eddi gian ng\u1eafn l\u1eafm có ph\u1ea3i không! B\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u1ea7u tiên là ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u1eb7t m\u1ee5c tiêu. Nên hãy l\u1ea5y ra m\u1ed9t t\u1edd gi\u1ea5y và vi\u1ebft 3 thói quen \u0103n u\u1ed1ng mà b\u1ea1n mu\u1ed1n thay \u0111\u1ed5i.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: M-Cn: Welcome to Newport News at Seven. Don't forget that next Saturday, the Newport Technology Museum will open its new interactive Robotics exhibit. This exhibit will feature many different robots, and visitors will be able to talk to them, play with them, and even learn from them. Students from the Robotics department at nearby Newport University will be at the museum on Saturday to show you how to interact with robots and explain how they work. But make sure to buy your tickets in advance from the museum's Web site. This event will be packed!
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Cn: Chào m\u1eebng \u0111\u1ebfn v\u1edbi B\u1ea3ng tin Newport lúc 7 gi\u1edd. \u0110\u1eebng quên là vào th\u1ee9 b\u1ea3y t\u1edbi, B\u1ea3o Tàng Công Ngh\u1ec7 Newport s\u1ebd m\u1edf tri\u1ec3n lãm Robot t\u01b0\u01a1ng tác m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a nó. Tri\u1ec3n lãm này s\u1ebd có nhi\u1ec1u lo\u1ea1i robot khác nhau, và du khách s\u1ebd có th\u1ec3 nói chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi chúng, ch\u01a1i v\u1edbi chúng, và th\u1eadm chí h\u1ecdc h\u1ecfi t\u1eeb chúng. Sinh viên t\u1eeb khoa ch\u1ebf t\u1ea1o Robot c\u1ee7a \u0110\u1ea1i h\u1ecdc Newport \u1edf g\u1ea7n \u0111ó s\u1ebd có \u1edf b\u1ea3o tàng vào th\u1ee9 b\u1ea3y \u0111\u1ec3 cho b\u1ea1n th\u1ea5y cách t\u01b0\u01a1ng tác v\u1edbi nh\u1eefng con robot và gi\u1ea3i thích cách chúng ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng. Nh\u01b0ng hãy \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o là b\u1ea1n \u0111ã mua vé tr\u01b0\u1edbc t\u1ea1i trang web c\u1ee7a b\u1ea3o tàng. S\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n này s\u1ebd r\u1ea5t \u0111ông \u0111ây!<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What will happen at the Newport Museum on Saturday?
childrens.answers: ["A parking area will be unavailable","An award will be presented","A gift shop will give discounts","An interactive exhibit will open"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Alright. Next on the agenda for today's sales meeting is our quarterly report. I'm sorry to say we only contracted ten new clients in the past three months. Of course, most of our sales team is new. Still... we can do better. Now, if you look up on the screen, you'll see a list of twenty organizations that we should consider targeting
this next quarter. I'd like each of you to go on the Internet to the organizations' Web pages to find out more about these potential clients. We'll discuss this at our next department meeting on Friday.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i. Ti\u1ebfp theo trong ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình ngh\u1ecb s\u1ef1 cho cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp bán hàng hôm nay là báo cáo h\u1eb1ng quý c\u1ee7a chúng ta. Tôi xin l\u1ed7i khi ph\u1ea3i báo r\u1eb1ng chúng ta ch\u1ec9 m\u1edbi l\u1eadp h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng v\u1edbi 10 khách hàng m\u1edbi trong 3 tháng qua. T\u1ea5t nhiên, h\u1ea7u h\u1ebft các nhóm bán hàng c\u1ee7a chúng ta v\u1eabn còn r\u1ea5t m\u1edbi l\u1ea1 v\u1edbi vi\u1ec7c này. Tuy nhiên... chúng ta v\u1eabn có th\u1ec3 làm t\u1ed1t h\u01a1n th\u1ebf. Bây gi\u1edd, n\u1ebfu các b\u1ea1n nhìn lên màn hình, các b\u1ea1n s\u1ebd th\u1ea5y m\u1ed9t danh sách g\u1ed3m hai m\u01b0\u01a1i t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c mà chúng ta nên cân nh\u1eafc nh\u1eafm t\u1edbi trong quý ti\u1ebfp theo. Tôi mu\u1ed1n m\u1ed7i b\u1ea1n lên m\u1ea1ng \u0111\u1ebfn các trang web c\u1ee7a các t\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c \u0111\u1ec3 tìm hi\u1ec3u thêm v\u1ec1 nh\u1eefng khách hàng ti\u1ec1m n\u0103ng này. Chúng ta s\u1ebd th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn t\u1ea1i cu\u1ed9c h\u1ecdp b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn ti\u1ebfp theo vào th\u1ee9 sáu.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio: M-Au: Hello, Mr. Kanno. This is Scott Jansen calling from KR Investors Group. Thanks for coming in last week for an interview for the market analyst position. We were very impressed with your past work experience, and we'd like to offer you the job. Now, as I'd mentioned, you'll have to relocate from Chicago to Vancouver. I'm confident you'll like living there. It's a great city, with a lot to do and see. So congratulations, I'm looking forward to speaking with you again. Oh, and please keep in mind that KR Investors Group won't be open next week.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

M-Au: Xin chào, anh Kanno. \u0110ây là Scott Jansen g\u1ecdi t\u1eeb T\u1eadp \u0110oàn \u0110\u1ea7u t\u01b0 KR. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì \u0111ã \u0111\u1ebfn \u0111ây vào tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111\u1ec3 ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n cho v\u1ecb trí nhà phân tích th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng. Chúng tôi r\u1ea5t \u1ea5n t\u01b0\u1ee3ng v\u1edbi kinh nghi\u1ec7m làm vi\u1ec7c trong quá kh\u1ee9 c\u1ee7a anh, và chúng tôi mu\u1ed1n \u0111\u1ec1 ngh\u1ecb công vi\u1ec7c này cho anh. Bây gi\u1edd, nh\u01b0 tôi \u0111ã \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp, anh s\u1ebd ph\u1ea3i chuy\u1ec3n t\u1eeb Chicago \u0111\u1ebfn Vancouver. Tôi tin r\u1eb1ng anh s\u1ebd thích s\u1ed1ng \u1edf \u0111ó. Nó là m\u1ed9t thành ph\u1ed1 tuy\u1ec7t v\u1eddi, v\u1edbi r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111\u1ec3 làm và tham quan. Xin chúc m\u1eebng, tôi r\u1ea5t mong \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nói chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi anh l\u1ea7n n\u1eefa. Và xin l\u01b0u ý r\u1eb1ng T\u1eadp \u0110oàn \u0110\u1ea7u t\u01b0 KR s\u1ebd không m\u1edf c\u1eeda làm vi\u1ec7c vào tu\u1ea7n sau.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Am: OK, listen up everyone. Business has been great at every one of our restaurant locations in Mercer City. And we've received a lot of inquiries about food delivery. Since we've never offered delivery before, I'd like to try it at just one location first. Although our uptown restaurant is the most central, I think it's best we start in the smallest
neighborhood because that's the most residential location. Plus, we've gotten a lot of requests from that area. We need to get the word out, though, so let's take some time now to discuss how we can advertise this new service.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Am: \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ed3i, m\u1ecdi ng\u01b0\u1eddi hãy nghe này. Công vi\u1ec7c kinh doanh \u0111ã r\u1ea5t thu\u1eadn l\u1ee3i \u1edf m\u1ed7i \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m nhà hàng c\u1ee7a chúng ta \u1edf Thành ph\u1ed1 Mercer. Và chúng ta \u0111ã nh\u1eadn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u câu h\u1ecfi v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c giao th\u1ee9c \u0103n. Vì chúng ta ch\u01b0a giao hàng bao gi\u1edd tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ây, tôi mu\u1ed1n th\u1eed s\u1ee9c v\u1edbi \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó t\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m tr\u01b0\u1edbc tiên. M\u1eb7c dù nhà hàng \u1edf ph\u1ed1 trên c\u1ee7a chúng ta là n\u01a1i t\u1eadp trung nh\u1ea5t, tôi ngh\u0129 t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t là chúng ta nên b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u \u1edf khu ph\u1ed1 nh\u1ecf nh\u1ea5t b\u1edfi vì \u0111ó là n\u01a1i có nhi\u1ec1u ng\u01b0\u1eddi c\u01b0 ng\u1ee5 nh\u1ea5t. Thêm n\u1eefa, chúng ta \u0111ã có r\u1ea5t nhi\u1ec1u yêu c\u1ea7u \u0103n u\u1ed1ng t\u1eeb khu v\u1ef1c \u0111ó. Tuy nhiên, chúng ta c\u1ea7n ph\u1ea3i thông báo vi\u1ec7c này, nên hãy dành th\u1eddi gian \u0111\u1ec3 th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn cách mà chúng ta có th\u1ec3 qu\u1ea3ng cáo d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 m\u1edbi này.<\/p>"}

questions.text_audio:
W-Br: Hi, Boris, this is Lucy from Human Resources. I'm calling to ask you a big favor - we have job candidates coming in for interviews tomorrow, and it turns out I have to step out of the office at one o'clock to go to a doctor's appointment. Would you be able to cover for me and interview the candidate at one o'clock? I'll be sure to forward you her CV, cover letter, and letters of reference so that you can prepare for the interview. Thanks so
much for your help.
questions.text_audio_trans:
{"vn":"

W-Br: Chào Boris, \u0111ây là Lucy c\u1ee7a Phòng Ngu\u1ed3n Nhân L\u1ef1c. Tôi g\u1ecdi \u0111\u1ec3 nh\u1edd anh giúp m\u1ed9t chuy\u1ec7n l\u1edbn - chúng tôi có các \u1ee9ng c\u1eed viên xin vi\u1ec7c \u0111\u1ebfn ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n vào ngày mai, và hóa ra là tôi ph\u1ea3i ra kh\u1ecfi v\u0103n phòng lúc 1 gi\u1edd \u0111\u1ec3 h\u1eb9n g\u1eb7p bác s\u0129. Anh có th\u1ec3 th\u1ebf ch\u1ed7 cho tôi và ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n \u1ee9ng c\u1eed viên lúc 1 gi\u1edd không? Tôi s\u1ebd g\u1eedi h\u1ed3 s\u01a1, th\u01b0 xin vi\u1ec7c, th\u01b0 gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u c\u1ee7a cô \u1ea5y \u0111\u1ec3 anh có th\u1ec3 chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb cho bu\u1ed5i ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n. C\u1ea3m \u01a1n vì s\u1ef1 giúp \u0111\u1ee1 c\u1ee7a anh.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Why is the speaker unable to participate in one of the interviews?
childrens.answers: ["She is leaving for a business trip","She has a medical appointment","She is stuck in traffic","She has to finish an urgent assignment"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1ea1i sao ng\u01b0\u1eddi nói không th\u1ec3 tham gia m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng cu\u1ed9c ph\u1ecfng v\u1ea5n?<\/p>

A. Cô \u1ea5y ph\u1ea3i \u0111i công tác<\/p>

B. Cô \u1ea5y có cu\u1ed9c h\u1eb9n khám s\u1ee9c kh\u1ecfe<\/p>

C. Cô \u1ea5y b\u1ecb k\u1eb9t xe<\/p>

D. Cô \u1ea5y ph\u1ea3i hoàn thành m\u1ed9t nhi\u1ec7m v\u1ee5 kh\u1ea9n c\u1ea5p<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

I'm calling to ask you a big favor - we have job candidates coming in for interviews tomorrow, and it turns out I have to step out of the office at one o'clock to go to a doctor's appointment.<\/p>","en":"

Why is the speaker unable to participate in one of the interviews?<\/p>

A. She is leaving for a business trip<\/p>

B. She has a medical appointment<\/p>

C. She is stuck in traffic<\/p>

D. She has to finish an urgent assignment<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

I'm calling to ask you a big favor - we have job candidates coming in for interviews tomorrow, and it turns out I have to step out of the office at one o'clock to go to a doctor's appointment.<\/p>"}

A. Bob Heilig<\/p>

C. Susan Petersen<\/p>

D. Maya Gomez<\/p>###

Would you be able to cover for me and interview the candidate at one o'clock?<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What does the speaker say she will do?
childrens.answers: ["Set up a training schedule","Organize a teleconference","Revise a job description","E-mail some materials"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ng\u01b0\u1eddi nói nói cô \u1ea5y s\u1ebd làm gì?<\/p>

A. Lên l\u1ecbch hu\u1ea5n luy\u1ec7n<\/p>

B. T\u1ed5 ch\u1ee9c m\u1ed9t h\u1ed9i ngh\u1ecb t\u1eeb xa<\/p>

C. S\u1eeda \u0111\u1ed5i b\u1ea3ng mô t\u1ea3 công vi\u1ec7c<\/p>

D. G\u1eedi e-mail m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 tài li\u1ec7u<\/p>###

I'll be sure to forward you her CV, cover letter, and letters of reference so that you can prepare for the interview.<\/p>","en":"

What does the speaker say she will do?<\/p>

A. Set up a training schedule<\/p>

B. Organize a teleconference<\/p>

I'll be sure to forward you her CV, cover letter, and letters of reference so that you can prepare for the interview.<\/p>"}

parts.name: Incomplete sentences
parts.title: A word or pharse is missing in each of the sentences below. Four answer choices are given below each sentence. Select the best answer to complete the sentence. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

intro.title:
Example:
The mother held her newborn ____

childrens.title: Jesper Associates currently has ____ with 26 different food suppliers
childrens.answers: ["contracting","contracts","contractor","contract"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Jesper Associates hi\u1ec7n có ____ v\u1edbi 26 nhà cung c\u1ea5p th\u1ef1c ph\u1ea9m khác nhau<\/p>

A. ký h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng (v)<\/p>

B. nh\u1eefng h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng (n)<\/p>

C. nhà th\u1ea7u (n)<\/p>

D. h\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng (n)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Chúng ta có \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb has v\u1edbi c\u1ea5u trúc has + N. Chúng ta c\u0169ng có gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb with nên ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t danh t\u1eeb. B\u1edfi vì chúng ta không có m\u1ea1o t\u1eeb nh\u01b0 the, ta c\u1ea7n c\u1ee5 th\u1ec3 m\u1ed9t danh t\u1eeb s\u1ed1 nhi\u1ec1u. Vì v\u1eady, (B) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

Jesper Associates currently has ____ with 26 different food suppliers<\/p>

A. contracting (v)<\/p>

B. contracts (n)<\/p>

C. contractor (n)<\/p>

D. contract (n)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We have the verb has with structure has + N. There is also the preposition with so we need a noun. Because we have no article such as the, we need a plural noun specifically. Therefore, (B) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Passengers must be at the gate ____ 25 minutes prior to boarding their flight
childrens.answers: ["at least","as much","in case","by then"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Hành khách ph\u1ea3i có m\u1eb7t t\u1ea1i c\u1ed5ng ____ 25 phút tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi lên máy bay<\/p>

A. t\u1ed1i thi\u1ec3u (prep)<\/p>

B. c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 th\u1ebf (adv) (as much = the same)<\/p>

C. trong tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ee3p (conj) (in case + m\u1ec7nh \u0111\u1ec1)<\/p>

D. \u0111\u1ebfn lúc \u0111ó (adv)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

(C) b\u1ecb lo\u1ea1i vì không phù h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi c\u1ea5u trúc c\u1ee7a câu. (A) và (D) c\u0169ng b\u1ecb lo\u1ea1i b\u1edfi vì c\u1ea5u trúc và ngh\u0129a không phù h\u1ee3p. Chúng ta có danh t\u1eeb 25 minutes \"25 phút\" nên (A) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng vì sau gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb là m\u1ed9t danh t\u1eeb.<\/p>","en":"

Passengers must be at the gate ____ 25 minutes prior to boarding their flight<\/p>

A. at least (prep)<\/p>

B. as much (adv) (as much = the same)<\/p>

C. in case (conj) (in case + clause)<\/p>

D. by then (adv)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

(C) is eliminated since it is unfit with the sentence's structure. (A) and (D) are also eliminated because of the unsuitable meaning and unfit structure. We have the noun 25 minutes so (A) is the correct answer since after a preposition is a noun.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Deltran analytics software can help ____ identify issues, predict trends, and improve business
childrens.answers: ["you","your","yours","yourself"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ph\u1ea7n m\u1ec1m phân tích Deltran có th\u1ec3 giúp ____ xác \u0111\u1ecbnh các v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1, d\u1ef1 \u0111oán xu h\u01b0\u1edbng và c\u1ea3i thi\u1ec7n doanh nghi\u1ec7p<\/p>

A. b\u1ea1n (\u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb) (You + V + O)<\/p>

B. c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n (adj) (your + N)<\/p>

C. c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n (\u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb) (Yours + to be + adj..., S + V + yours, S + V + O + ... + prep + yours)<\/p>

D. chính b\u1ea1n (\u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb) (S + V + yourself; .... + prep + yourself.)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Chúng ta có \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb identify \"xác \u0111\u1ecbnh\" và tân ng\u1eef issues \"v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1\" nên d\u1ef1a trên c\u1ea5u trúc, (A) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

Deltran analytics software can help ____ identify issues, predict trends, and improve business<\/p>

A. you (pronoun) (You + V + O)<\/p>

B. your (adj) (your + N)<\/p>

C. yours (pronoun) (Yours + to be + adj..., S + V + yours, S + V + O + ... + prep + yours)<\/p>

D. yourself (pronoun) (S + V + yourself; .... + prep + yourself.)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We have the verb identify and the object issues so based on the structure, (A) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The technology department ____ to purchase three new servers next year
childrens.answers: ["announces","thinks","predicts","plans"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

B\u1ed9 công ngh\u1ec7 ____ mua ba máy ch\u1ee7 m\u1edbi vào n\u0103m t\u1edbi<\/p>

A. công b\u1ed1 (v)<\/p>

B. ngh\u0129 (v)<\/p>

C. d\u1ef1 \u0111oán (v)<\/p>

D. d\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn (v)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

D\u1ef1a trên ý ngh\u0129a, (D) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

The technology department ____ to purchase three new servers next year<\/p>

A. announces (v)<\/p>

B. thinks (v)<\/p>

C. predicts (v)<\/p>

D. plans (v)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Based on the meaning, (D) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Jennson Motors hired an ____ new efficiency expert last month
childrens.answers: ["approximate","angular","exceptional","eventual"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Jennson Motors \u0111ã thuê m\u1ed9t k\u1ef9 s\u01b0 c\u1ed1 v\u1ea5n____ m\u1edbi vào tháng tr\u01b0\u1edbc<\/p>

A. x\u1ea5p x\u1ec9 (adj)<\/p>

B. góc (adj)<\/p>

C. xu\u1ea5t s\u1eafc (adj)<\/p>

D. cu\u1ed1i cùng (adj)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

D\u1ef1a trên ý ngh\u0129a, (C) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

Jennson Motors hired an ____ new efficiency expert last month<\/p>

A. approximate (adj)<\/p>

B. angular (adj)<\/p>

C. exceptional (adj)<\/p>

D. eventual (adj)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Based on the meaning, (C) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Mr. Winkel's ____ responsibilities include auditing and financial review of large clients
childrens.answers: ["accounts","accounted","accounting","accountable"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Trách nhi\u1ec7m ____ c\u1ee7a anh Winkel bao g\u1ed3m rà soát ki\u1ec3m toán và tài chính c\u1ee7a khách hàng l\u1edbn<\/p>

A. tài kho\u1ea3n (n)<\/p>

B. h\u1ea1ch toán (v)<\/p>

C. k\u1ebf toán (v)<\/p>

D. ch\u1ecbu trách nhi\u1ec7m (adj)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Ta có danh t\u1eeb responsibilities \"trách nhi\u1ec7m\" nên ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t tính t\u1eeb, m\u1ed9t \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ed9ng thêm -ing ho\u1eb7c V3\/ed \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ed5 ngh\u0129a cho nó. D\u1ef1a trên ý ngh\u0129a, (C) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng và c\u0169ng b\u1edfi vì nó có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c dùng \u0111\u1ec3 mô t\u1ea3 ch\u1ee9c n\u0103ng c\u1ee7a danh t\u1eeb.<\/p>","en":"

Mr. Winkel's ____ responsibilities include auditing and financial review of large clients<\/p>

A. accounts (n)<\/p>

B. accounted (v)<\/p>

C. accounting (v)<\/p>

D. accountable (adj)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We have the noun responsibilities so we need either an adjective, an active verb with -ing or V3\/ed to complement it. Based on the meaning, (C) is the correct answer and also because it can be used to describe the function of the noun.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The prime minister greeted foreign diplomats ____ a luncheon today in London
childrens.answers: ["at","had","such","where"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Th\u1ee7 t\u01b0\u1edbng chào \u0111ón các nhà ngo\u1ea1i giao n\u01b0\u1edbc ngoài ____ b\u1eefa ti\u1ec7c hôm nay \u1edf London<\/p>

A. t\u1ea1i (prep) (at + th\u1eddi gian\/n\u01a1i ch\u1ed1n\/N\/V-ing \/ \u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb)<\/p>

B. có (v)<\/p>

C. \u0111i\u1ec1u \u0111ó (n) (such + a\/an + adj\/N + that +...; such + adj + N; such + N)<\/p>

D. \u1edf \u0111âu (\u0111\u1ea1i t\u1eeb)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Sau kho\u1ea3ng tr\u1ed1ng là danh t\u1eeb luncheon \"b\u1eefa ti\u1ec7c\" nên (A) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng vì sau gi\u1edbi t\u1eeb là m\u1ed9t danh t\u1eeb.<\/p>","en":"

The prime minister greeted foreign diplomats ____ a luncheon today in London<\/p>

A. at (prep) (at + time\/places\/N\/V-ing\/pronoun)<\/p>

B. had (v)<\/p>

C. such (n) (such + a\/an + adj\/N + that +...; such + adj + N; such + N)<\/p>

D. where (pronoun)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

After the blank space is the noun luncheon so (A) is the correct answer since after a preposition is a noun.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: The management team at Otto Corporation offers incentives ____ employee productivity
childrens.answers: ["stimulate","to stimulate","will stimulate","are stimulating"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

T\u1ed5 qu\u1ea3n lý t\u1ea1i T\u1eadp \u0110oàn Otto \u0111\u01b0a ra \u0111\u1ed9ng c\u01a1 làm vi\u1ec7c ____ n\u0103ng su\u1ea5t lao \u0111\u1ed9ng<\/p>

A. kích thích (v)<\/p>

B. \u0111\u1ec3 kích thích (v)<\/p>

C. s\u1ebd kích thích (v)<\/p>

D. \u0111ang kích thích (v)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Chúng ta có ch\u1ee7 ng\u1eef The management team \"T\u1ed5 qu\u1ea3n lý\" và \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb chính offers \"\u0111\u01b0a ra\" nên ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t tr\u1ee3 \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb. Tr\u1ee3 \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb có th\u1ec3 là V-ing, V3\/ed ho\u1eb7c to + V. Vì th\u1ebf, (B) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

The management team at Otto Corporation offers incentives ____ employee productivity<\/p>

A. stimulate (v)<\/p>

B. to stimulate (v)<\/p>

C. will stimulate (v)<\/p>

D. are stimulating (v)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We have the subject The management team and the main verb offers so we need an auxiliary verb. The auxiliary verb can be V-ing, V3\/ed or to + V. Therefore, (B) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: In response to customer ____, Lopez Naturals will release a line of organic soaps
childrens.answers: ["demand","permit","arrival","account"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110\u1ec3 \u0111áp \u1ee9ng ____ khách hàng, Lopez Naturals s\u1ebd tung ra m\u1ed9t dòng s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9n xà phòng h\u1eefu c\u01a1<\/p>

A. nhu c\u1ea7u (n)<\/p>

B. gi\u1ea5y phép (n)<\/p>

C. s\u1ef1 \u0111\u1ebfn (n)<\/p>

D. tài kho\u1ea3n (n)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

D\u1ef1a trên ý ngh\u0129a, (A) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

In response to customer ____, Lopez Naturals will release a line of organic soaps<\/p>

A. demand (n)<\/p>

B. permit (n)<\/p>

C. arrival (n)<\/p>

D. account (n)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Based on the meaning, (A) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Before the computers leave the factory, they are ____ thoroughly to ensure they have no defects
childrens.answers: ["selected","inspected","attached","managed"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi các máy tính r\u1eddi kh\u1ecfi nhà máy, chúng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ____ k\u1ef9 càng \u0111\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o chúng không có l\u1ed7i<\/p>

A. ch\u1ecdn (v)<\/p>

B. ki\u1ec3m tra (v)<\/p>

C. \u0111ính kèm (v)<\/p>

D. qu\u1ea3n lý (v)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

D\u1ef1a trên ý ngh\u0129a, (B) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

Before the computers leave the factory, they are ____ thoroughly to ensure they have no defects<\/p>

A. selected (v)<\/p>

B. inspected (v)<\/p>

C. attached (v)<\/p>

D. managed (v)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Based on the meaning, (B) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: WRUZ Radio will broadcast a new show ____ to business news and economic analysis
childrens.answers: ["allowed","prepared","dedicated","introduced"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110ài Phát Thanh WRUZ s\u1ebd phát sóng m\u1ed9t ch\u01b0\u01a1ng trình m\u1edbi ____ tin t\u1ee9c doanh nghi\u1ec7p và phân tích kinh t\u1ebf<\/p>

A. cho phép (v) (allow s.b. to do sth)<\/p>

B. chu\u1ea9n b\u1ecb (v) (prepared to + V)<\/p>

C. dành riêng (adj) (dedicated to + N)<\/p>

D. gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u (v)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Chúng ta \u0111ã có \u0111\u1ed9ng t\u1eeb broadcast \"phát sóng\" nên (A), (B) và (D) b\u1ecb lo\u1ea1i. Ta có c\u1ee5m danh t\u1eeb business news and economic analysis \"tin t\u1ee9c doanh nghi\u1ec7p và phân tích kinh t\u1ebf\" nên d\u1ef1a trên c\u1ea5u trúc, (C) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

WRUZ Radio will broadcast a new show ____ to business news and economic analysis<\/p>

A. allowed (v) (allow s.b. to do sth)<\/p>

B. prepared (v) (prepared to + V)<\/p>

C. dedicated (adj) (dedicated to + N)<\/p>

D. introduced (v)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We already have the verb broadcast so (A), (B) and (D) are eliminated. We have the noun phrase business news and economic analysis so based on the structure, (C) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: Mr. Okada met ____ with the building manager to discuss the demolition project
childrens.answers: ["frequent","frequenting","frequently","frequented"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

Ông Okada g\u1eb7p ng\u01b0\u1eddi qu\u1ea3n lý tòa nhà ____ \u0111\u1ec3 th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn v\u1ec1 d\u1ef1 án phá d\u1ee1<\/p>

A. th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên (adj)<\/p>

B. \u0111ang lui t\u1edbi (v)<\/p>

C. m\u1ed9t cách th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên (adv)<\/p>

D. \u0111ã lui \u0111\u1ebfn (v)<\/p>###

Chính sách m\u1edbi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n g\u1ea7n \u0111ây \u0111ã s\u1eafp x\u1ebfp l\u1ea1i n\u1ee3 c\u1ee7a công ty d\u1ef1a trên k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch 5 b\u01b0\u1edbc _____<\/p>

A. c\u1ea9n th\u1eadn (adj)<\/p>

B. m\u1ed9t cách d\u1ec5 dùng (adv)<\/p>

C. qu\u1ea3n lý (v)<\/p>

D. d\u1ec5 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng (adj)<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

Chúng ta có c\u1ee5m danh t\u1eeb five-step plan \"k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch 5 b\u01b0\u1edbc\" nên ta c\u1ea7n m\u1ed9t tính t\u1eeb \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ed5 ngh\u0129a cho nó. D\u1ef1a trên ý ngh\u0129a, (D) là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

The recently adopted policy restructures the company's debt according to a ____ five-step plan<\/p>

A. managing (adj)<\/p>

B. manageably (adv)<\/p>

C. manages (v)<\/p>

D. manageable (adj)<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

We have the noun phrase five-step plan so we need an adjective to complement it. Based on the meaning, (D) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

Explanation:<\/p>

We have a clause after the blank space so we need conjunction. Based on the meaning, (B) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

parts.name: Text completion
parts.title: Read the texts that follow. A word or pharse is missing in some of the sentences. Four answer choices are given below each of the sentences. Select the best answer to complete the text. Then mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

questions.text_read:
Commercial relocation may at first appear __(1)__ , but Mester Movers will work with you to make the process as simple as possible. Whether you are relocating an office, factory, or laboratory across town or across the country, we have the people, technology, and resources to __(2)__ your move with efficiency.

We take special care when packing small and delicate objects. __(3)__ , we make sure that large items such as desks, filing cabinets, and chairs are also ready for the move by providing you with special tags. __(4)__
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Tái \u0111\u1ecbnh c\u01b0 th\u01b0\u01a1ng m\u1ea1i ban \u0111\u1ea7u có v\u1ebb __(1)__, nh\u01b0ng Mester Movers s\u1ebd làm vi\u1ec7c cùng b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ec3 th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n quá trình này m\u1ed9t cách \u0111\u01a1n gi\u1ea3n nh\u1ea5t có th\u1ec3. Cho dù b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1ecbnh chuy\u1ec3n v\u0103n phòng, nhà máy, hay phòng thí nghi\u1ec7m ngang qua th\u1ecb tr\u1ea5n hay trên kh\u1eafp \u0111\u1ea5t n\u01b0\u1edbc, chúng tôi có ngu\u1ed3n nhân l\u1ef1c, công ngh\u1ec7 và tài nguyên \u0111\u1ec3 __(2)__ vi\u1ec7c di d\u1eddi c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n m\u1ed9t cách hi\u1ec7u qu\u1ea3.<\/p>

Chúng tôi \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t chú ý khi \u0111óng gói nh\u1eefng \u0111\u1ed3 v\u1eadt nh\u1ecf và d\u1ec5 v\u1ee1. __(3)__, chúng tôi \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o r\u1eb1ng các \u0111\u1ed3 v\u1eadt l\u1edbn nh\u01b0 bàn, t\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ef1ng h\u1ed3 s\u01a1, và gh\u1ebf c\u0169ng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eb5n sàng cho vi\u1ec7c di chuy\u1ec3n b\u1eb1ng cách cung c\u1ea5p cho b\u1ea1n nh\u1eefng chi\u1ebfc th\u1ebb \u0111\u1eb7c bi\u1ec7t.__(4)__<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
Purchase Order Guidelines

Mapleshades Medical Center authorizes certain employees to purchase goods and services for company-related business. To purchase a __(1)__ item or service, fill out the online request form. Use the form to __(2)__ a description of the item needed. Also, briefly explain why the purchase is necessary. Note that your __(3)__ may affect subsequent decisions. If the request entails replacing a device that is out of order, bring the matter to the attention of Mr. Rowen, head of the Maintenance Division, before submitting the request. __(4)__ . Please direct any questions you may have related to the purchase of office supplies and equipment to the Purchasing Department.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Nguyên T\u1eafc \u0110\u1eb7t Mua Hàng<\/p>

Trung Tâm Y T\u1ebf Mapleshades cho phép m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 nhân viên nh\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ecbnh mua hàng hóa và d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 cho công vi\u1ec7c có liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn công ty. \u0110\u1ec3 mua m\u1ed9t m\u1eb7t hàng ho\u1eb7c d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 __(1)__, hãy \u0111i\u1ec1n vào m\u1eabu yêu c\u1ea7u tr\u1ef1c tuy\u1ebfn. S\u1eed d\u1ee5ng bi\u1ec3u m\u1eabu \u0111\u1ec3 __(2)__ mô t\u1ea3 v\u1ec1 m\u1eb7t hàng c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft. Ngoài ra, gi\u1ea3i thích ng\u1eafn g\u1ecdn t\u1ea1i sao vi\u1ec7c mua hàng l\u1ea1i c\u1ea7n thi\u1ebft. Chú ý r\u1eb1ng __(3)__ c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng \u0111\u1ebfn nh\u1eefng quy\u1ebft \u0111\u1ecbnh sau. N\u1ebfu yêu c\u1ea7u \u0111òi h\u1ecfi thay th\u1ebf m\u1ed9t thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb h\u1ebft hàng, hãy nói v\u1ea5n \u0111\u1ec1 \u0111ó cho anh Rowen, tr\u01b0\u1edfng Phòng B\u1ea3o Trì bi\u1ebft tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi g\u1eedi yêu c\u1ea7u. __(4)__. Xin hãy g\u1eedi b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 câu h\u1ecfi nào có liên quan \u0111\u1ebfn vi\u1ec7c mua v\u0103n phòng ph\u1ea9m và thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb mà b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 có cho Phòng Giao D\u1ecbch.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
From: Hong Kong Princess Center Administration
To: All Princess Center residents
Date: 17 October
Subject: Higwam workers to maintain C-level elevators

__(1)__ the past week you may have experienced increased wait times for our C-level elevators, which service floors 25 through 36. We have contacted Higwam, our elevator maintenance contractor, who __(2)__ repairs in the elevator shafts.

This is to alert all residents that beginning tomorrow and through the end of the week, you are likely to see Higwam technicians working in the lobby. They are planning to work on one unit at a time in order to keep the others operational while repairs are in progress, so for the next few __(3)__ , there may continue to be prolonged wait times. __(4)__

For any questions, please contact our office. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your patience.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

T\u1eeb: C\u01a1 Quan Qu\u1ea3n Lý Trung Tâm Công Chúa H\u1ed3ng Kông
\u0110\u1ebfn: T\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c\u01b0 dân c\u1ee7a Trung Tâm Công Chúa
Ngày: 17 Tháng 10
Ch\u1ee7 \u0111\u1ec1: Nhân viên Higwam b\u1ea3o d\u01b0\u1ee1ng thang máy b\u1eadc C<\/p>

__(1)__ tu\u1ea7n tr\u01b0\u1edbc, các b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 \u0111ã tr\u1ea3i qua th\u1eddi gian ch\u1edd \u0111\u1ee3i cho thang máy b\u1eadc C c\u1ee7a chúng tôi, là thang máy t\u1eeb t\u1ea7ng 25 \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1ea7ng 36. Chúng tôi \u0111ã liên l\u1ea1c v\u1edbi Higwam, nhà th\u1ea7u b\u1ea3o trì thang máy, ng\u01b0\u1eddi __(2)__ s\u1eeda \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng thông thang máy.<\/p>

\u0110ây là thông báo cho t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 các c\u01b0 dân b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u t\u1eeb ngày mai \u0111\u1ebfn cu\u1ed1i tu\u1ea7n, các b\u1ea1n có th\u1ec3 s\u1ebd th\u1ea5y k\u1ef9 thu\u1eadt viên c\u1ee7a Higwam làm vi\u1ec7c \u1edf hành lang. H\u1ecd \u0111ang lên k\u1ebf ho\u1ea1ch s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa cho m\u1ed9t \u0111\u01a1n v\u1ecb t\u1ea1i m\u1ed9t th\u1eddi \u0111i\u1ec3m \u0111\u1ec3 nh\u1eefng thang máy khác ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng trong lúc công vi\u1ec7c s\u1eeda ch\u1eefa \u0111ang \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ti\u1ebfn hành, vì v\u1eady trong vài __(3)__ ti\u1ebfp theo, có th\u1ec3 s\u1ebd ph\u1ea3i ti\u1ebfp t\u1ee5c kéo dài thêm th\u1eddi gian ch\u1edd \u0111\u1ee3i. __(4)__<\/p>

V\u1edbi b\u1ea5t k\u1ef3 câu h\u1ecfi nào, hãy liên h\u1ec7 v\u1edbi v\u0103n phòng c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Chúng tôi xin l\u1ed7i vì s\u1ef1 b\u1ea5t ti\u1ec7n này và trân tr\u1ecdng s\u1ef1 kiên nh\u1eabn c\u1ee7a các b\u1ea1n.<\/p>"}

__(1)__<\/p>

A. Between (prep) (between + N + and + N)<\/p>

Explanation:<\/p>

We have the phrase the past week so based on the structure, (C) is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read: DAKAR (August 4)- Nentique Laboratories, Inc., announced today the development of a new variety of organic wheat that __(1)__ heat. Dozens of plants were cross-pollinated over many years to produce this variety, known as GR-712. It joins a growing list of __(2)__ that can withstand high temperatures during extended dry periods. "Some farmers in regions close to the equator focus __(3)__ on rice production because rice grows well in hot climates. But in the Sahara, it is too dry for much of the year," explains company spokesman Ahmad Niang. "But for a small investment in GR-712 seeds, farmers will now be able to grow wheat in our region. " __(4)__ . This added income can, in turn, be reinvested in better machinery, which will encourage more environmentally friendly farming practices.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

DAKAR (ngày 4 tháng 8) - Công ty Nentique Laboratories \u0111ã công b\u1ed1 vi\u1ec7c phát tri\u1ec3n m\u1ed9t gi\u1ed1ng lúa mì h\u1eefu c\u01a1 m\u1edbi __(1)__ nhi\u1ec7t. Hàng tá cây \u0111ã \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ee5 ph\u1ea5n qua nhi\u1ec1u n\u0103m \u0111\u1ec3 s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t gi\u1ed1ng cây này, còn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c bi\u1ebft \u0111\u1ebfn là GR-712. Nó \u0111ã gia nh\u1eadp vào danh sách ngày càng t\u0103ng __(2)__ có th\u1ec3 ch\u1ecbu \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nhi\u1ec7t \u0111\u1ed9 cao trong th\u1eddi k\u1ef3 khô h\u1ea1n. \"M\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 nông dân \u1edf khu v\u1ef1c g\u1ea7n xích \u0111\u1ea1o __(3)__ t\u1eadp trung vào vi\u1ec7c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t lúa g\u1ea1o vì g\u1ea1o phát tri\u1ec3n t\u1ed1t \u1edf khí h\u1eadu nóng. Nh\u01b0ng \u1edf Sahara, nó quá khô c\u1eb1n trong ph\u1ea7n l\u1edbn c\u1ee7a n\u0103m,\" phát ngôn viên c\u1ee7a Ahmad Niang gi\u1ea3i thích. \"Nh\u01b0ng v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t kho\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 nh\u1ecf cho h\u1ea1t gi\u1ed1ng GR-712, nông dân bây gi\u1edd s\u1ebd có th\u1ec3 tr\u1ed3ng lúa mì trong khu v\u1ef1c c\u1ee7a chúng ta.\"__(4)__. Các kho\u1ea3n thu nh\u1eadp \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thêm vào có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c dùng \u0111\u1ec3 tái \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0 vào thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb máy móc t\u1ed1t h\u01a1n, và nó s\u1ebd thêm ph\u1ea7n khuy\u1ebfn khích các ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng canh tác thân thi\u1ec7n v\u1edbi môi tr\u01b0\u1eddng.<\/p>"}

parts.name: Reading comprehension
parts.title: In this part you will read a selection of texts, such as magezine and newspaper articles, letters, and advertisements. Each text is followed by several questions. Select the best answer for each question and mark the letter (A), (B), (C) or (D) on your answer sheet.

intro.title:
Example:
Are you someone who enjoys trying new things and does not feel uncomfortable in new environment? Then why not get paid for it? CULTURE magazine is looking for individuals to go to ne
intro.answers: ["A. a homebody", "B. an introvert", "C. a clumsy person", "D. a risk-taker"]

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Jane Equi [10:41 sáng]: Chào Mateo. Brian Jaffers v\u1eeba g\u1ecdi \u0111\u1ec3 h\u1ee7y bu\u1ed5i ki\u1ec3m tra vào ngày mai \u1edf S\u1ed1 721 \u0110\u01b0\u1eddng Union.
Mateo Rodriguez [10:42 sáng]: T\u1ec7 quá. Chung c\u01b0 \u0111ó r\u1ea5t phù h\u1ee3p v\u1edbi anh ta. Cô có h\u1eb9n l\u1ea1i không?
Jane Equi [10:44 sáng]: Có, vào th\u1ee9 n\u0103m, ngay tr\u01b0\u1edbc khi anh \u0111i xem Nhà Rockledge v\u1edbi gia \u0111ình Kim. Hai \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m \u0111ó r\u1ea5t g\u1ea7n v\u1edbi nhau.
Mateo Rodriguez [10:45 sáng]: Tuy\u1ec7t. Cô có th\u1ec3 xác nh\u1eadn th\u1eddi gian v\u1edbi cô Kim hôm nay không?
Jane Equi [10:47 sáng]: Ch\u1eafc ch\u1eafn r\u1ed3i.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: At 10:45 A.M., what does Mr. Rodriguez most likely mean when he writes, "Great"?
childrens.answers: ["He is excited about the results of his work","He is glad about his company's new location","He is pleased with Ms. Equi's work","He is interested in contacting Mr. Jaffers"]

{"vn":"

Lúc 10:45 sáng, anh Rodriguez có th\u1ec3 có ý gì khi anh ta nói, \"Tuy\u1ec7t\"?<\/p>

A. Anh \u1ea5y r\u1ea5t hào h\u1ee9ng v\u1ec1 k\u1ebft qu\u1ea3 công vi\u1ec7c c\u1ee7a mình<\/p>

B. Anh \u1ea5y vui m\u1eebng v\u1ec1 \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a công ty<\/p>

C. Anh \u1ea5y hài lòng v\u1edbi vi\u1ec7c làm c\u1ee7a cô Equi<\/p>

D. Anh \u1ea5y có h\u1ee9ng thú liên l\u1ea1c v\u1edbi anh Jaffers<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

Jane Equi [10:44 A.M.]: Yes, for Thursday, just before you show the Rockledge Place property to the Kim family. The two sites are very close to each other.<\/p>

Mateo Rodriguez [10:45 A.M.]: Great. Could you please confirm the time with Ms. Kim today?<\/p>","en":"

At 10:45 A.M., what does Mr. Rodriguez most likely mean when he writes, \"Great\"?<\/p>

A. He is excited about the results of his work<\/p>

B. He is glad about his company's new location<\/p>

C. He is pleased with Ms. Equi's work<\/p>

D. He is interested in contacting Mr. Jaffers<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

Jane Equi [10:44 A.M.]: Yes, for Thursday, just before you show the Rockledge Place property to the Kim family. The two sites are very close to each other.<\/p>


Mateo Rodriguez [10:45 A.M.]: Great. Could you please confirm the time with Ms. Kim today?<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

\u0110óng Sàn Tàu Wallaby
Ph\u1ee5c v\u1ee5 t\u1ea1i Queensland và h\u01a1n n\u1eefa
Chúc m\u1eebng cho boong g\u1ed7 m\u1edbi c\u1ee7a b\u1ea1n! Hãy làm theo nh\u1eefng m\u1eb9o này \u0111\u1ec3 gi\u1eef nó \u1edf tr\u1ea1ng thái t\u1ed1t nh\u1ea5t trong nhi\u1ec1u n\u0103m t\u1edbi.
\u2713 \u0110\u1eafp m\u1ed9t l\u1edbp ch\u1ed1ng th\u1ea5m UV m\u1ed7i n\u0103m \u0111\u1ec3 b\u1ea3o v\u1ec7 cho boong tàu kh\u1ecfi s\u1ef1 \u1ea3nh h\u01b0\u1edfng c\u1ee7a \u0111\u1ed9 \u1ea9m và nhi\u1ec7t \u0111\u1ed9.
\u2713 Gi\u1eef cho kho\u1ea3ng tr\u1ed1ng gi\u1eefa các t\u1ea5m ván s\u1ea1ch b\u1ee5i và không có m\u1ed9t m\u1ea3nh v\u1ee5n. Không khí ph\u1ea3i \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thông qua \u1edf xung quanh và gi\u1eefa các t\u1ea5m ván \u0111\u1ec3 ng\u0103n vi\u1ec7c t\u0103ng \u0111\u1ed9 \u1ea9m.
\u2713 Lau boong tàu theo \u0111\u1ecbnh k\u1ef3. S\u1eed d\u1ee5ng m\u1ed9t bàn ch\u1ea3i lông m\u1ec1m, m\u1ed9t vòi n\u01b0\u1edbc và thu\u1ed1c t\u1ea9y không có ch\u1ea5t hóa h\u1ecdc \u0111\u1ec3 d\u1ecdn s\u1ea1ch b\u1ee5i \u0111\u1ea5t mà không lo\u1ea1i b\u1ecf \u0111\u1ed9 mài nh\u1eb5n.
\u2713 Tránh v\u1ebft th\u1eafm n\u01b0\u1edbc và n\u1ea5m m\u1ed1c. Không \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ec3 cây trong ch\u1eadu ho\u1eb7c nh\u1eefng v\u1eadt l\u1edbn, n\u1eb7ng n\u1eb1m tr\u1ef1c ti\u1ebfp trên b\u1ec1 m\u1eb7t boong.<\/p>"}

childrens.title: What is NOT mentioned as a tip for deck maintenance?
childrens.answers: ["Applying a weather-resistant coating","Cleaning the surface regularly","Removing stains with a chemical cleaner","Keeping plants off the surface"]
childrens.explains:
{"vn":"

\u0110i\u1ec1u gì không \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp là m\u1eb9o b\u1ea3o d\u01b0\u1ee1ng boong tàu?<\/p>

A. \u0110\u1eafp l\u1edbp ph\u1ee7 ch\u1ed1ng ch\u1ecdi th\u1eddi ti\u1ebft<\/p>

B. Lau s\u1ea1ch b\u1ec1 m\u1eb7t th\u01b0\u1eddng xuyên<\/p>

C. Lo\u1ea1i b\u1ecf nh\u1eefng v\u1ebft b\u1ea9n b\u1eb1ng ch\u1ea5t t\u1ea9y r\u1eeda hóa h\u1ecdc<\/p>

D. Gi\u1eef cho cây kh\u1ecfi b\u1ec1 m\u1eb7t<\/p>###

Gi\u1ea3i thích:<\/p>

D\u1ef1a trên thông tin:<\/p>

\"Apply a coat of UV sealant annually to shield the deck from the effects of moisture and heat.<\/p>

Wash the deck periodically. Use a soft-bristled brush, a hose, and a chemical-free detergent to clean away dirt without removing the finish.<\/p>

Avoid water stains and mildew. Do not allow potted plants or other large, heavy objects to rest directly on the surface of the deck.\"<\/p>

Không có \u0111\u1ec1 c\u1eadp \u0111\u1ebfn (C) nên nó là câu tr\u1ea3 l\u1eddi \u0111úng.<\/p>","en":"

What is NOT mentioned as a tip for deck maintenance?<\/p>

A. Applying a weather-resistant coating<\/p>

B. Cleaning the surface regularly<\/p>

C. Removing stains with a chemical cleaner<\/p>

D. Keeping plants off the surface<\/p>###

Explanation:<\/p>

Based on the information:<\/p>

\"Apply a coat of UV sealant annually to shield the deck from the effects of moisture and heat.<\/p>

Wash the deck periodically. Use a soft-bristled brush, a hose, and a chemical-free detergent to clean away dirt without removing the finish.<\/p>

Avoid water stains and mildew. Do not allow potted plants or other large, heavy objects to rest directly on the surface of the deck.\"<\/p>

There is no mention of (C) so it is the correct answer.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read:
Hapkell Industries Pairs Up with E&T Recycling Center

June 19-The computer technology company Hapkell Industries just announced it will begin working with E&T Recycling Centers. This partnership will enable consumers to responsibly recycle computer equipment, at no personal cost, simply by taking it to a collection center.

"Used computers make up a rapidly growing waste source," said CEO Indira Kapoor. "As a major producer of computer products, we believe it is our obligation to reuse what we can and keep heavy metals out of the landfills. This is what prompted us to go forward with this initiative."

Hapkell Industries originally sponsored two pilot E&T collection sites and, given their success, aims to add ten more sites by year's end. To learn more about the initiative and for a map of current and proposed collection sites, visit ETrecyclingcenter.com.
questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

Hapkell Industries H\u1ee3p Tác v\u1edbi Trung Tâm Tái Ch\u1ebf E&T
Ngày 19 tháng 6 - Công ty công ngh\u1ec7 máy tính Hapkell Industries công b\u1ed1 vi\u1ec7c nó s\u1ebd b\u1eaft \u0111\u1ea7u làm vi\u1ec7c v\u1edbi Trung Tâm Tái Ch\u1ebf E&T. S\u1ef1 h\u1ee3p tác này s\u1ebd cho phép ng\u01b0\u1eddi tiêu dùng tái ch\u1ebf m\u1ed9t cách h\u1ee3p lý thi\u1ebft b\u1ecb máy tính, mà không t\u1ed1n chi phí cá nhân, b\u1eb1ng cách ch\u1ec9 c\u1ea7n mang nó \u0111\u1ebfn trung tâm thu l\u01b0\u1ee3m.
\"Máy tính \u0111ã qua s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng chi\u1ebfm ph\u1ea7n l\u1edbn ngu\u1ed3n ch\u1ea5t th\u1ea3i \u0111ang t\u0103ng lên m\u1ed9t cách nhanh chóng, \"T\u1ed5ng Giám \u0110\u1ed1c \u0110i\u1ec1u Hành Indira Kapoor cho bi\u1ebft. \"Là m\u1ed9t nhà s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m máy tính hàng \u0111\u1ea7u, chúng tôi tin r\u1eb1ng \u0111ây là b\u1ed5n ph\u1eadn c\u1ee7a chúng tôi trong vi\u1ec7c tái s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng khi có th\u1ec3 và gi\u1eef cho kim lo\u1ea1i n\u1eb7ng kh\u1ecfi m\u1eb7t \u0111\u1ea5t. \u0110i\u1ec1u này \u0111ã thúc gi\u1ee5c chúng tôi \u0111\u1ea9y m\u1ea1nh sáng ki\u1ebfn này.\"
Hapkell Industries ban \u0111\u1ea7u tài tr\u1ee3 cho hai \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m thu l\u01b0\u1ee3m E&T và vì s\u1ef1 thành công c\u1ee7a chúng, \u0111ã nh\u1eafm thêm m\u01b0\u1eddi \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m n\u1eefa vào cu\u1ed1i n\u0103m. \u0110\u1ec3 tìm hi\u1ec3u thêm v\u1ec1 sáng ki\u1ebfn này cùng b\u1ea3n \u0111\u1ed3 c\u1ee7a các \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m thu l\u01b0\u1ee3ng hi\u1ec7n t\u1ea1i và \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111\u1ec1 xu\u1ea5t, hãy truy c\u1eadp vào ETrecyclingcenter.com<\/p>"}

A. \u0110\u1ec3 s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t các s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m máy tính có giá c\u1ea3 ph\u1ea3i ch\u0103ng h\u01a1n<\/p>

D. Theo \u0111u\u1ed5i c\u01a1 h\u1ed9i tài chính<\/p>###

Thông tin trong bài:<\/p>

As a major producer of computer products, we believe it is our obligation to reuse what we can and keep heavy metals out of the landfills. This is what prompted us to go forward with this initiative.<\/p>","en":"

According to Ms. Kapoor, why did her company partner with a recycling firm?<\/p>

A. To manufacture more affordable computer products<\/p>

B. To follow a government environmental policy<\/p>

C. To meet a responsibility as an industry leader<\/p>

D. To pursue a rewarding financial opportunity<\/p>###

Information:<\/p>

As a major producer of computer products, we believe it is our obligation to reuse what we can and keep heavy metals out of the landfills. This is what prompted us to go forward with this initiative.<\/p>"}

questions.text_read_trans:
{"vn":"

\u0110\u1ebfn: Stan Anyati
T\u1eeb: Stella Gerraldi
Ngày: 1 Tháng 5
Ch\u1ee7 \u0110\u1ec1: Quán Cà Phê Marti
Stan thân m\u1ebfn,
Hôm qua tôi \u0111ã g\u1ecdi cho c\u1eeda hàng c\u1ee7a anh và nói chuy\u1ec7n v\u1edbi Andre v\u1ec1 máy pha cà phê espresso c\u1ed5 \u0111i\u1ec3n c\u1ee7a tôi. Tôi \u0111ã r\u1ea5t ng\u1ea1c nhiên khi anh ta có th\u1ec3 tìm \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn thay th\u1ebf cho m\u1ed9t chi\u1ebfc máy c\u0169 nh\u01b0 v\u1eady. Anh \u1ea5y c\u0169ng tái t\u1ea1o m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 b\u1ed9 ph\u1eadn \u0111ã không còn \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t n\u1eefa. Hình nh\u01b0 là có m\u1ed9t cái giá b\u1eb1ng \u0111\u1ed3ng cho b\u1ea3ng tên c\u1ee7a nhà s\u1ea3n xu\u1ea5t v\u1eabn ch\u01b0a \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c giao \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1eeb Ý. M\u1ed9t khi chúng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c giao \u0111\u1ebfn, vi\u1ec7c khôi ph\u1ee5c có th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c hoàn t\u1ea5t.
Nh\u01b0 chúng ta \u0111ã th\u1ea3o lu\u1eadn tr\u01b0\u1edbc \u0111ó, tôi c\u1ea7n cái máy giao vào ngày 7 tháng 5. Vào ngày 8 tháng 5 chúng tôi s\u1ebd m\u1eebng l\u1ec5 k\u1ec9 ni\u1ec7m ngày khai tr\u01b0\u01a1ng quán cà phê l\u1ea7n th\u1ee9 10. Máy pha cà phê espresso luôn là v\u1eadt trang trí chính c\u1ee7a chúng tôi. Chúng tôi dùng nó trong t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 qu\u1ea3ng cáo c\u1ee7a mình. Th\u1eadm chí khi không có b\u1ea3ng tên, tôi c\u1ea7n cái máy c\u1ed5 này ho\u1ea1t \u0111\u1ed9ng cho l\u1ec5 k\u1ef7 ni\u1ec7m.
Trân tr\u1ecdng,
Stella<\/p>"}
